scripts.platform:start: npx supabase start && echo 'Waiting for Supabase...' && sleep 3 && docker compose -f platform/docker-compose.common.yaml -f platform/docker-compose.n8n.yaml -f platform/docker-compose.speckle.yaml --env-file platform/.env up -d
scripts.platform:start-dtcc: npx supabase start && echo 'Waiting for Supabase...' && sleep 3 && docker compose -f platform/docker-compose.common.yaml -f platform/docker-compose.n8n.yaml -f platform/docker-compose.speckle.yaml --env-file platform/.env up -d
scripts.platform:stop: npx supabase stop && docker compose -f platform/docker-compose.common.yaml -f platform/docker-compose.dtcc-core.yaml -f platform/docker-compose.n8n.yaml -f platform/docker-compose.speckle.yaml down
scripts.platform:stop-dtcc: npx supabase stop && docker compose -f platform/docker-compose.common.yaml -f platform/docker-compose.dtcc-core.yaml -f platform/docker-compose.n8n.yaml -f platform/docker-compose.speckle.yaml down
scripts.build:cli: cd cli && go build -o supabase main.go
scripts.gen:types: ./cli/supabase gen types typescript --local | sed 's/export interface Database {/export type Database = {/' > packages/model/src/generated/db.ts
